SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETFINANCIALSPONSOR
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the Constituent ID of the financial sponsor
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETFINANCIALSPONSOR ( @sponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin
declare @financialSponsor uniqueidentifier = null
if @sponsorshipID is not null select @financialSponsor = REVENUE.CONSTITUENTID
from dbo.SPONSORSHIP left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT on REVENUESPLIT.ID = SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.REVENUE on REVENUE.ID = REVENUESPLIT.REVENUEID
where SPONSORSHIP.ID = @sponsorshipID
return @financialSponsor end
